NetworkDiscoverableLogin.name: NetworkDiscoverableLogin
NetworkDiscoverableLogin.description: Represents the Login Discoverable page from where customers and partners log in to an Experience Cloud site. Customers and partners are users with an External Identity license or any communities license for Experience Cloud.

ApexHandlerId.description: The ID of the Apex handler created by the Login Discovery page type.

ExecuteApexHandlerAsId.description: The ID of the user who is executing the handler.

UsernameLabel.description: Log in prompt on login page when the login page type is Login Discovery.
